title: THURSDAY 4/1 - PRO DAY STANDOUTS
itunes:title: THURSDAY 4/1 - PRO DAY STANDOUTS
description:
The Patriots were big spenders in free agency this offseason. Team owner Robert Kraft (0:09) talks about the decision to be aggressive on the free agent market. Giants co-owner John Mara (1:17) ready to change things in New York...Plus, a pair of top draft picks wowed NFL coaches and GM's with their performances Wednesday. Ja'Marr Chase (2:10) and Kyle Pitts showing why they'll be some of the first names called on draft night

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
